subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] The world is catching up!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I'm not sure about the breakthrough, but there are several systems and 
mehtods that work. I think maybe the big break through will be people 
realizing that this communication is possible.  Yeah, it's kinda srange how 
there's a whole gourp about our age that is active in ITC.

Frank


>From: "Candi" <candismoo123@...>
>Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] The world is catching up!
>Date: Sat, 24 Feb 2007 00:17:36 -0800
>
>Frank!
>I went to that url you listed here and I saw where you posted. Here I was, 
>thinking that you were OLD, but to my surprise, you and I are the same age! 
>Well, at least for the moment. I was born May 9th, 1953. So you may 
>actually be older or younger, but we're both 53 right now! I find this 
>amusing! I should have known! LOL Learn something new everyday! Ain't that 
>the truth!
>That site I went to, about Montague Keen, was very interesting! I joined 
>also! It's all very impressive! What do you think the big "breakthrough" in 
>spirit communication is going to be?
>Thanks for the info,
>Candi
>
>   ----- Original Message -----
>   From: Frank Sumption
>   To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>   Sent: Friday, February 23, 2007 11:23 PM
>   Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] The world is catching up!
>
>
>   Yeah, there are examples on the sites I went to, not remembering now 
>which
>   thery were, and the favorites that I marked are at work. I have had 
>voices
>   like that too, using the crowd noise from one of our school board 
>meetings.
>   There was some ghopst voices mixed in. These entities will speak with 
>almost
>   anything if they know someone is/will be listening.
>
>   http://www.itcbridge.com/forum/ Here's a very interesting forum for 
>EVP/ITC.
>
>   Frank
